people_also_ask.question: What is the point of Animal Crossing?
people_also_ask.heading: For those untouched by the cult of Nook, Animal Crossing: New Horizons lets you set up an alternate life on a pleasant island populated by gently weird animals. You fish, catch bugs, water flowers, plant fruit trees and accumulate cute things with which to decorate your home and set dress the island.13-May-2020
